name: Vegan Cookie Dough
description: This vegan cookie dough dip makes the perfect afternoon treat! It's not only super delicious, but also incredibly healthy and packed with protein.

recipeInstructions.text: Place all of the ingredients except for the chocolate chips into a food processor.
recipeInstructions.name: Place all of the ingredients except for the chocolate chips into a food processor.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chocolate chips and stir well with a spoon.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the chocolate chips and stir well with a spoon.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve with vegan cookies or fruit. If you want, you could add some vegan cookie crumbles on top.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve with vegan cookies or fruit. If you want, you could add some vegan cookie crumbles on top.

keywords: how to make vegan cookie dough, vegan cookie dough, vegan cookie dough recipe
